topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5445c1a963687234c3340000#post_5445c1a963687234c3340000

There's another version of the Myth in which Medusa declared herself even more beautiful than Athena inside one of her temples and cursed her with men unable to appreciate her beauty by turning her into a gorgon.

Then, when Perseus killed her, from her blood, the Pegasus was born.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

You know that shit is what Athena would have made up after the fact. 

I didn't know the Pegasus thing though... So rainbow dash and fluttershy are technically descendants of medusa?
